experience.description:
Performed in a senior developer/team lead role on an enterprise app for Megapolis - a long standing cross-platform multiplayer city building game, oriented to a free-to-play model. 
The game was developed for: 
 
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.socialquantum.acityint 
- IOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/megapolis/id580765736 
 
Developed and supported mobile client for Android/IOS/Windows10 from the beginning. 
Used technologies: C++11/14, STL, Boost, Multithreading, Objective C, Java, NDK, Qt, Lua, OpenGL. 
 
Developed and designed a cross-platform engine written on C++ from the beginning. 
 
Integrated plenty of platform-specific components, such as: 
- Social networks SDK: facebook, ios game center, android google play games, vkontakte, odnoklassniki, moimir. 
- IOS/Android/Amazon in-app purchasing. 
- Firebase push-notifications. 
- Statistics services SDK: admob, google analytics, appsflyer, etc. 
- Advertising: facebook bidder, applovin, tapjoy, unity ads, etc. 
- Crash reporting systems: crashlytics, self-designed crash reporting system written on C. 
 
Developed numbers of game mechanics and tools. 
Interacted with server-side of the game 
 
Managed a team of 3-6 developers, reviewed the code and distributing of tasks as well.
Developed .NET components for parsing and visualization of Microsoft PowerPoint documents
Developed and improved 3D engine component for visualization of geological models (DirectX 8-9, OpenGL)
Developed and improved 3D engine component for visualization of geological models (DirectX 8-9, OpenGL)

higher.name: Tyumen State University, Tyumen
higher.faculty: Institute of mathematics and computer sciences, Specialist in Technical Science
